issue.title: [C++][Parquet] parquet::Statistics::Equals() with minmax returns wrong result
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16487](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16487). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
For example, the same statistics that doesn't minmax always returns `false` with `statistics.Equals(statistics)`.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16487?focusedCommentId=17534173) by Kouhei Sutou (kou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 13087
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/13087>
